channel.title: Mark Robinson
channel.description: It's kinda fun to build the engaging future

item.title: Chromebook Pixel 2015 (LS) Review
item.description: Pixel 2015 Unboxing The time is finally right for me to share some thoughts about my 2015 Chromebook Pixel ludicrous speed edition. I’ve been a proud owner of a beautiful Pixel for 6 months now and it’s still my daily driver. I initially asked myself how I could live with...
